Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.11 Kāmāvacaraduka » 13.11.1 Paṭiccavāra » 13.11.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 13.11.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
Piṭṭhiduka
Kāmāvacaraduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
198.
4515Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
4516Naārammaṇapaccayā…  tīṇi.
<< 13.11.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Naadhipatyādi >>
